law.catch_line: The Board shall reinstate the license of a pharmacist whose license has been expired for less than 2...

text.section:
The Board shall reinstate the license of a pharmacist whose license has been expired for less than 2 years, if the pharmacist:
Meets the renewal and reinstatement requirements set by rule and regulation of the Board; and
Pays to the Board the reinstatement fee set by the Board.

The Board shall reinstate the license of a pharmacist whose license has been expired for 2 years or more if the pharmacist:
Meets the reinstatement requirements established by the Board in its rules or regulations; and
Satisfies the requirements of subsection (a) of this section.
